question: Marrying the daughter of one father's wife; Selecting a wife (pre-marital relationships); Imam Mahdi, signs of Qiyamah
answer:
QUESTION
First, masha'allah, excellent site brothers in Islam, very impressive and informative, it will aid greatly in education of our Muslim brothers and sisters worldwide. Q1. Assuming, father marries another woman, who already has a daughter from another man i.e., not sister, and from different blood. Is it permissible to marry her? Q2. We are forbidden to make relationships with women before marriage. The reason most people give in favour of pre-marriage relationship is to discover any opinions etc in a man/woman that might cause quarrels after marriage. Especially nowadays where its more likely to find such women, whom are more likely to argue, due to their lack of Islamic knowledge, or be reluctant to learn our righteous ways, after seeming suitable, before marriage. So, what is the argument in favour of not having pre-marital relationship, to avoid selecting such women? Q3. One day our Mahdi will come, in times when humanity is suffering, and the world is full of evil*(in short, but you know what im talking about). I?ve read all the hadiths about the Mahdi. *Does that mean that our world is headed for a really bad time; I mean should we expect great difficulty in the future? Before our Mahdi rescues us... Brothers, excuse the lengthy enquiry, I hope the questions are not repeated, and worthy of your attention. Jazakum'allah khayran.
